text: sillo hananim-eun geudaeege gyesihayeossgeoneul ineun noana geu ihu yeeonjadeul-ege gyesihan geosgwa gat-eumyeo ttohan abeulahamgwa iseuma-elgwa isag gwa yagobgwa geuui husongwa yesuwa a iyong-gwa yunuseuwa halungwa sollomon-e ge gyesihan geosgwa gat-eumyeo dawon-ege sipyeon-eul naelingeosgwado gat-eunila
